home.brief_story: To claim the one and only supreme throne, countless rival factions wage war upon this land.
home.brief_tutorial: Expend your action points to summon fierce warriors, lead them in battle, or draw mighty cards. Combine their strengths and shatter every obstacle that stands before you.

conquer.name: Conquer
conquer.desc: Maintain a friendly unit within 6 spaces of a capture point for 3 consecutive turns.

init.name: Start Phase
init.desc_1: All players each roll a die and sum the results.
init.desc_2: If the total is odd, the first round is designated as a Sun Year.
init.desc_3: If the total is even, the first round is designated as a Moon Year.
init.desc_4: The year type then alternates each round thereafter.
init.desc_5: Each player selects a faction and places their Lord on their respective starting position.
init.desc_6: The battlefield can be arranged according to the rulebook or customized freely by the players.

game.name: Game Phase
game.desc_1: A Round (also referred to as a Year) begins with the first player and continues until the last player has completed their turn.
game.desc_2: The time between a player’s current turn and their next turn is referred to as a Turn.
game.desc_3: At the beginning of each turn, players gain action points based on the current round number:
game.desc_4: When it is your turn in the round, you may spend your action points (AP) to perform any of the following actions:
game.desc_6: Spend 2 AP to draw a card from the Central Deck (shared).
game.desc_7: Spend 3 AP to draw a card from your Faction Deck.
game.desc_8: Cards drawn may be World Cards or Faction Cards.
game.desc_11: Pay the required AP cost stated on the soldier.
game.desc_13: Each unit can take the following actions:
game.desc_15: Consume the amount of AP listed in the skill description. Each skill may only be used once per turn.
game.desc_17: A unit may move once per turn. It moves 1 tile per point of Dexterity.

hit_check.name: Hit Check
hit_check.desc_1: If the attack does not have "Guaranteed Hit", roll 1d6 to determine whether it hits.
hit_check.desc_2: (Target's Dexterity [max 6] + Target's Damage Resistance + 3 - Accuracy) ≤ Dice Roll

damege_calculation.name: Damage Calculation
damege_calculation.desc_1: If the attack hits, calculate damage as follows:
damege_calculation.desc_2: Actual Damage = Damage − (Defense − Pierce) [If result < 0, treat as 0]
damege_calculation.desc_4: If the unit's HP is reduced to 0 or below, it is defeated and must be removed from the battlefield.

general.name: General
general.desc_1: Terrain may be placed on any empty tile.
general.desc_2: In Capture Point Mode, terrain cannot be placed within 1 tile of a capture point

mountains.name: Mountains
mountains.desc_1: Can be placed on Water or Canyon tiles.
mountains.desc_2: When placed, both the Mountain and the underlying tile are removed, converting the tile into normal ground.

canyon.name: Canyon
canyon.desc_1: Can be placed on Mountain tiles.
canyon.desc_2: When placed, both the Canyon and the underlying tile are removed, converting the tile into normal ground.
canyon.desc_4: Small units may hide in Canyons.
canyon.desc_5: If the Canyon is destroyed, hidden units inside take 1d6 true unavoidable damage.

water.name: Water
water.desc_1: When a unit steps onto Water, it is immediately displaced to a random empty tile adjacent to the Water’s endpoint.
water.desc_2: If placed adjacent to a Canyon, the Canyon is converted into Water.

rush.name: Rush
rush.desc_1: The target is pushed 1 tile away from the attacker's range.
rush.desc_2: If unable to move, the target takes double damage, and the attacker stops immediately.

multi_strike.name: Multi-Strike
multi_strike.desc_2: Each attack requires a separate hit check.

burn.name: Burn
burn.desc_1: Deals 2 true damage at the start of each action.
burn.desc_2: Reduces Burn stacks by 1 per activation.
burn.desc_3: Units affected by Burn suffer -2 Defense.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.desc_1: The target location must be at least 3 tiles away from all enemy units.

stun.name: Stun
stun.desc_1: A stunned unit cannot act, and all attacks automatically hit.
stun.desc_2: At the end of its turn, it may roll 1d6 against Difficulty X to recover.
stun.desc_4: Stun stacks decrease by 1 at the end of each turn.

exhausted.name: Exhausted
exhausted.desc_1: This action cannot be used if any other action has been taken this turn.
exhausted.desc_2: After using an Exhausted action, no further actions may be taken this turn.

armor_break.name: Armor Break
armor_break.desc_1: Each stack of Armor Break reduces Defense by 1.

poison.name: Poison
poison.desc_1: Deals 1 true damage at the start of each action.
poison.desc_2: Reduces Poison stacks by 1 per activation.
poison.desc_3: Units affected by Poison suffer -3 Damage and -1 Dexterity.

trait_1.name: Dawn Court
trait_1.effect: At the start of each of your turns, if it is a Sun Year, gain 1 stack of [Imperial Reports].For each stack of [Imperial Reports], gain +2 additional AP. Maximum 5 stacks.

trait_2.name: Battle Formation
trait_2.effect: Dragon Engraved Guards and Tiger Robe Warriors can form a Battle Formation. Damage and defense increase based on the number of units in the formation: 2：Damage +1、Defense +1/ 3：Damage +2、Defense +1/ 4：Damage +2、Defense +2. Units forming the formation must remain adjacent (each pair within a distance of 1). Each formation can have up to 3 units; if General Zaoqi joins, the limit increases to 4. Units in the formation must move together and cannot separate. The formation’s movement agility is the average agility of all units in the formation. Each movement consumes 2 action points.

trait_3.name: Purge
trait_3.effect: Allies have +2 Accuracy against Rebels. When Rebels are present on the battlefield, all units gain +1 Dexterity.

skill_1.name: Diligent Governance
skill_1.desc: You may declare the outcome of a single check.

skill_2.name: Falling Star
skill_2.desc: Place a mark on a targeted spot. After one turn, deal 10 damage to the marked spot and all adjacent cells within 2 tiles. Guaranteed Hit.

skill_3.name: Imperial Command
skill_3.desc: Increases the damage of all soldiers within 3 tiles by 3 points.

skill_1.name: Harvest
skill_1.desc: Action Point+3

skill_2.name: Mountain God's Power
skill_2.desc: Damage：6. Accuracy：4. Range：1. Attack Type：Ground/Melee/Single Target

skill_3.name: Earthstride
skill_3.desc: Allows the user to teleport to a tile within 5 spaces that is adjacent to a mountain tile.

skill_4.name: Shared Fate
skill_4.desc: When one Earth God is killed, they will be revived next turn next to the surviving Earth God. Only when both Earth Gods are dead will they be permanently eliminated.

skill_5.name: Blessing of the Earth
skill_5.desc: Allied units gain +1 Defense when adjacent to a mountain tile.

card_1.name: Golden Harvest
card_1.desc: Gain 6 additional action points. Remove all Famine cards from the field.

card_2.name: Prosperous Nation
card_2.desc: This round, all of your actions cost 1 less action point.

card_3.name: 借刀殺人
card_3.desc: 控制一名敵方兵棋發動其能對其他單位造成傷害的技能，發動時需要額外支付該技能所需行動點，發動的技能設為必中，發動技能後結束控制

card_4.name: 學富五車
card_4.desc: 抽取5張世界排，保留3張後將剩餘2張重新洗入牌堆

card_5.name: 萬邦來朝
card_5.desc: 可向所有玩家討要一張世界卡，拒絕給予的玩家所屬勢力的所有單位會被標記為反賊，持續2回合。對方選擇給予則拿出所有世界卡給供抽取

card_6.name: 撒豆成兵
card_6.desc: 召喚1D6個成本不大於2的兵棋

skill_3.desc: 只對生命兵棋生效。進行1D6難度3的判定。通過則可控制該兵棋1回合

skill_4.name: 血液魔法-緋紅爆彈
skill_4.desc: 指定一個3格內的目標，進行1D6難度X的判定。X為目標血量。若沒通過則對目標造成3點必中真實傷害。若通過，則目標立即死亡，並且對其周圍一格內所有單位造成Y點真實傷害。Y為目標血量最大值 / 2

skill_7.name: 初擁
skill_7.desc: 第一個擊殺的敵人會轉化成血僕。(如果無法再進行召喚則轉化為等量的行動點)

skill_1.name: 拔刀術-血閃
skill_1.desc: 傷害：5。命中：4。攻擊距離：3。攻擊類型：地面/近戰(突進)/範圍

skill_2.name: 神血之槍-突
skill_2.desc: 傷害：5 (額外傷害範圍內傷害翻倍，額外傷害無法爆擊)。命中：3。攻擊距離：3。攻擊類型：全域/直射/範圍

skill_3.name: 血色擁抱
skill_3.desc: 選擇一名血僕或渴血者進行1D6判定。1:失敗死亡，並對周圍所有單位造成3點必中真實傷害。2~3:失敗無效果。4:將其轉變為鮮血騎士。5:將其轉變為腥紅爵士。6:將其轉變為緋色大公。受轉變的單位血量補滿。

skill_4.name: 真理血眸
skill_4.desc: 下次自身攻擊變為必中且必定爆擊

skill_1.name: 緋色下午茶
skill_1.desc: 所有友方單位傷害+2命中+1

skill_2.name: 血色妄想
skill_2.desc: 指定一個兵棋使其視為生命單位(永久)

skill_3.name: 超合金斬艦菜刀
skill_3.desc: 傷害：6。命中：6。攻擊距離：1。攻擊類型：地面/近戰/範圍

skill_4.name: 赤月舞步
skill_4.desc: 我方單位閃避豁免+2一回合

skill_5.name: 緋紅饗宴
skill_5.desc: 我方擊殺任何生命單位觸發。所有友方單位傷害+2，敏捷+1持續一回合。（最多疊加3層）

skill_1.name: 劍氣縱橫
skill_1.desc: 傷害：2 (每提升2階傷害+3)。命中：3。攻擊距離：2。攻擊類型：同當前位置/近戰/目標周圍一格

skill_2.name: 萬劍歸宗
skill_2.desc: 等階=4可發動。傷害：12。命中：3。攻擊距離：2。攻擊類型：同當前位置/近戰/自身周圍4格

skill_3.name: 御劍
skill_3.desc: 等階>=2可發動。切換位置處於地面/天空

skill_1.name: 五雷法
skill_1.desc: 傷害：4 (每提升2階傷害+4)。特效：給予命中單位暈眩1。命中：2 (每提升1階命中+1)。攻擊距離：4。攻擊類型：全域/鎖定/單體

skill_2.name: 布陣
skill_2.desc: 等階>=2可發動。在自身格子召喚一個標記。在標記周圍3格的友軍防禦+1(可疊加，至多3層)。若自身離開標記處，則標記立即失效

skill_3.name: 護身剛炁
skill_3.desc: 等階=4可發動。每回合獲得一個可以抵擋傷害(真傷以外)的剛炁護盾。受到任何傷害後失效，不論成功抵擋與否

skill_1.name: 如意璽
skill_1.desc: 傷害：1。特效：將命中單位的其中一項數值(敏捷/防禦/命中/傷害)下降2點，每提升1階額外下降2。命中：2。攻擊距離：3。攻擊類型：全域/曲射/單體

skill_2.name: 煉器
skill_2.desc: 進行一次2D6，難度8的判定(每階-1難度)。若通過，則指定一個我方單位提升(敏捷/防禦/傷害)X點(不可疊加)。X為器修自身當前等階 + 1。若重複提升則以新數值覆蓋舊數值。

skill_1.name: 煉丹
skill_1.desc: 進行一次2D6，難度8的判定(每階-1難度)。通過後再進行一次1D6判定，決定煉成丹藥(丹藥不必立即使用，可保存直到使用為止)。1：回春丸-回復3格內指定單位5點血量。2：虎魄散-提升3格內指定單位3點傷害，一輪。3-築基丹。提升3格內指定一階單位至二階。4-回魂湯。復活3格內一名友軍。5-大還丹。指定一名友方單位。投擲一個6面骰子，若點數大於指定單位的等階+1，則該單位受到4點傷害並提升一階，反之則不受傷害提升兩階。6：九轉金丹-提升位於自身3格內的一名指定單位至滿階。

skill_1.name: 鐵山靠
skill_1.desc: 傷害：2 (每提升1階傷害+1)。特效：給予命中單位暈眩2。自身防禦力+3，持續一回合。命中：5。攻擊距離：1。攻擊類型：地面/近戰(突進)/單體。

skill_2.name: 隔山打牛
skill_2.desc: 傷害：3 (每提升1階傷害+1)。額外效果：若擊中目標則額外對其後方單位造成雙倍傷害。▢：自身位置。▣：指定點。▧：額外傷害範圍。▢▣▧。命中：2。攻擊距離：1。攻擊類型：地面/近戰/單體

skill_1.name: 青蓮劍歌
skill_1.desc: 傷害：8。命中：5。攻擊距離：1。攻擊類型：同當前位置/近戰/單體

skill_2.name: 點化
skill_2.desc: 進行1D6難度3的判定。成功則提升一個我方兵棋1階

skill_3.name: 慧眼
skill_3.desc: 下次召喚的兵棋提升一階

skill_4.name: 調息
skill_4.desc: 回復所有技能使用次數

skill_5.name: 飛天
skill_5.desc: 切換位置處於地面/天空

skill_1.name: 血煞濁龍槍
skill_1.desc: 傷害：8。額外效果：造成的實際傷害用於回復自身等量血量。命中：4。攻擊距離：2。攻擊類型：同當前位置/近戰/單體。

skill_2.name: 血魔追殺令
skill_2.desc: 指定一名敵方單位為目標，所有己方單位對其傷害+2和命中+1。同時只能存在一個目標

skill_3.name: 飛天
skill_3.desc: 切換位置處於地面/天空

skill_4.name: 赤血丹
skill_4.desc: 己方單位擊殺敵方生命單位時，可指定一個兵棋承受2點傷害並提升一階(可選擇是否發動)
